p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
p.span: The mission of the Rockville Centre School District is to educate our students to become independent problem solvers. It is our goal to empower each student to meet the challenges of tomorrow’s emerging world. The District will provide a safe, nurturing environment in which individual and civic responsibility is fostered, diversity is respected and all students are enabled to realize their full potential.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
